channel.title: Divanshu Chauhan's Blog
channel.description: Developer building useful tools with code and curiosity.
channel.author: divkix@divkix.me (Divanshu Chauhan)

item.title: The Developer's Authenticity Paradox: Why Success Feels Like Performance
item.description: The authenticity paradox explained: why your online persona diverges from your real self. Psychology research + my experience with 500k users and daily metrics obsession.
item.author: divkix@divkix.me (Divanshu Chauhan)

item.title: Claude Code vs Cursor vs Copilot (2025): Best AI Coding Tools Compared
item.description: I've spent $50+/month on AI coding tools for a year. Here's what actually works, what's overhyped, and when to use each tool (including free local LLMs).
item.author: divkix@divkix.me (Divanshu Chauhan)

item.title: My 2025 Stack for Shipping Side Projects Fast as a Grad Student
item.description: How I shipped 30+ projects while getting my MS in Computer Science at ASU. The stack choices that let me build fast, deploy faster, and actually sleep at night. Real lessons from PickMyClass, Alita Robot, and projects serving 250K+ users.
item.author: divkix@divkix.me (Divanshu Chauhan)

item.title: How I Host My Portfolio for $0/Month on Cloudflare
item.description: Zero hosting costs, global edge deployment, and sub-50ms response times. Here's how I run divkix.me on Cloudflare Workers with Next.js 15 and why you should consider ditching Vercel.
item.author: divkix@divkix.me (Divanshu Chauhan)

item.title: Running AI on My Mac: Why I Ditched ChatGPT for LM Studio
item.description: How I run powerful AI models locally on my M4 Pro MacBook with LM Studio. Privacy, speed, and vision models that can see images - all offline.
item.author: divkix@divkix.me (Divanshu Chauhan)

item.title: PickMyClass: Never Miss Your Dream Class Again
item.description: How I built a class notification system that watches for open seats and instructor updates, so students never miss their dream classes due to constant refreshing.
item.author: divkix@divkix.me (Divanshu Chauhan)
